name: aviation-weather-mcp-server
description: MCP server for aviation weather and flight planning

scripts.aviation-weather-api:build: npm run aviation-weather-api:fetch && npm run aviation-weather-api:generate && cd packages/aviation-weather-api && npm run build
scripts.aviation-weather-api:generate: cd packages/aviation-weather-api && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./swagger.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o ./ -c generator.yaml
scripts.inspect: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/index.js
